title: Clicker

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The host must answer all questions regarding role ability priorities truthfully if asked.

desc:
Post 3444
*This thing can tell the fitness of any person it visits based off of living conditions and lifestyle, as this obviously translates to real life speediness*

Abilities
- Visit a player
- You learn the amount of priorities the visited player has (without any factional abilities or third party abilities added)
- If the target has 1 priority, you learn the priority. If it has more than one, you learn a random priority, but you know weather or not is the fastest or slowest. (Again before any modifications)
-if the visited player has 3 or more abilities, you know what place the priority comes in if they were to all race
